languages.text: "Приветствую Вольного Торговца. Мы выследили шайку душегубов, возглавляемую знаменитой преступницей Лукрецией ван дер Ройсен. Эта мерзавка повинна во многих злодеяниях, в том числе в убийстве собственного отца, планетарного губернатора мира Селевкар. Она вступила в сговор с пустотным отребьем, помогла ему устроить резню на родной планете, а затем заделалась их вожачкой и теперь творит беззаконие. Приглашаю вас присоединиться к свершению правосудия!"

"Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"
languages.original_text: "Приветствую Вольного Торговца. Мы выследили шайку душегубов, возглавляемую знаменитой преступницей Лукрецией ван дер Ройсен. Эта мерзавка повинна во многих злодеяниях, в том числе в убийстве собственного отца, планетарного губернатора мира Селевкар. Приглашаю вас присоединиться к свершению правосудия!"

traits.locale_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roysen. This wretch is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with the void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

She conspired with the void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir haben eine Bande von Mördern aufgespürt, die von der berüchtigten Kriminellen Lucretia van der Roycen angeführt wird. Diese Frau ist für zahlreiche Gräueltaten wie die Ermordung ihres Vaters und des Gouverneurs der imperialen Welt Seleucar verantwortlich. Sie hat mit Leerenabschaum konspiriert, um auf ihrem Heimatplaneten ein Massaker zu begehen. Dann wurde sie ihre Anführerin und mittlerweile läuft sie Amok. Ich lade Euch hiermit ein, ihr mit vereinten Kräften das Handwerk zu legen."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

Diese Frau ist für zahlreiche Gräueltaten wie die Ermordung ihres Vaters und des Gouverneurs der imperialen Welt Seleucar verantwortlich. Sie hat mit Leerenabschaum konspiriert, um auf ihrem Heimatplaneten ein Massaker zu begehen. Dann wurde sie ihre Anführerin und mittlerweile läuft sie Amok. Ich lade Euch hiermit ein, ihr mit vereinten Kräften das Handwerk zu legen."

languages.text: « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous avons remonté la piste d'une bande d'assassins emmenés par la criminelle notoire Lucrétia van der Roycen. Cette femme s'est rendue coupable de nombreuses atrocités, à commencer par le meurtre de son propre père, le gouverneur planétaire du monde impérial de Seleucar. Elle a conspiré avec des truands, qu'elle a aidés à perpétrer un massacre sur sa planète natale, avant de prendre leur tête pour semer le chaos dans son sillage. Joignez-vous à moi, et veillons ensemble à ce que justice soit rendue ! »
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous avons remonté la piste d'une bande d'assassins emmenés par la criminelle notoire Lucrétia van der Roycen. Cette femme s'est rendue coupable de nombreuses atrocités, à commencer par le meurtre de son propre père, le gouverneur planétaire du monde impérial de Seleucar. Elle a conspiré avec des truands, qu'elle a aidés à perpétrer un massacre sur sa planète natale, avant de prendre leur tête pour semer le chaos dans son sillage. Joignez-vous à moi, et veillons ensemble à ce que justice soit rendue ! »

languages.text: «Saludos, Comerciante Independiente. Hemos seguido a una banda de asesinos, liderados por la conocida criminal Lucretia van der Roycen, a este lugar. La mujer es responsable de numerosas atrocidades, incluyendo matar a su padre, el gobernador del mundo Imperial de Seleucar. Conspiró con la chusma del vacío para cometer una masacre contra su propio mundo natal, se convirtió en su líder y ahora está descontrolada. ¡Le invito a que me ayude a traerla ante la justicia!».
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, Comerciante Independiente. Hemos seguido a una banda de asesinos, liderados por la conocida criminal Lucretia van der Roycen, a este lugar. La mujer es responsable de numerosas atrocidades, incluyendo matar a su padre, el gobernador del mundo Imperial de Seleucar. Conspiró con la chusma del vacío para cometer una masacre contra su propio mundo natal, se convirtió en su líder y ahora está descontrolada. ¡Le invito a que me ayude a traerla ante la justicia!».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーにご挨拶を。悪名高樹犯罪者、ルクレティア・ファン・デル・ロイセンが率いる殺人集団を追い詰めました。この女は、インペリアルワールド・セレウカーの惑星提督である実の父親を含む、数々の残虐行為に関与しているのです。彼女はヴォイドの暴徒と共謀し、故郷の惑星での大虐殺に手を貸し、そのリーダーとなり、そして暴走している。私と共に、彼女に正義の鉄槌を下そうではありませんか！」
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーにご挨拶を。悪名高樹犯罪者、ルクレティア・ファン・デル・ロイセンが率いる殺人集団を追い詰めました。この女は、インペリアルワールド・セレウカーの惑星提督である実の父親を含む、数々の残虐行為に関与しているのです。彼女はヴォイドの暴徒と共謀し、故郷の惑星での大虐殺に手を貸し、そのリーダーとなり、そして暴走している。私と共に、彼女に正義の鉄槌を下そうではありませんか！」

languages.text: “向您致意，行商浪人。我们正在追击由臭名昭著的海盗卢克丽霞·冯·德·罗伊森领导的帮派成员。这个女人犯下了无数罪行，其中包括谋杀了她自己的父亲，帝国世界塞琉卡的行星总督。她与那些卑劣的暴徒合谋，协助他们在她的故乡进行大屠杀。她成了那些暴徒的首领，到处肆意妄为。我邀请您与我一起将她绳之以法！”
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，行商浪人。我们正在追击由臭名昭著的海盗卢克丽霞·冯·德·罗伊森领导的帮派成员。这个女人犯下了无数罪行，其中包括谋杀了她自己的父亲，帝国世界塞琉卡的行星总督。她与那些卑劣的暴徒合谋，协助他们在她的故乡进行大屠杀。她成了那些暴徒的首领，到处肆意妄为。我邀请您与我一起将她绳之以法！”

languages.text: "Merhaba Hür Tacir. Azılı bir suçlu olan Lucretia van der Roycen önderliğindeki bir katil çetesinin peşindeyiz. Bu kadın, aralarında öz babasını ve İmparatorluk dünyası Seleucar'ın gezegen valisini öldürmenin de bulunduğu nice vahşetin sorumlusudur. Uçsuz ayaktakımıyla komplo kurarak onların kendi gezegeninde katliam yapmalarına yardım etti. Liderleri oldu, şimdi de önüne gelene saldırıyor. Onu adalete teslim etmek için bana eşlik etmenizi rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Rogue Trader. We have tracked down a gang of murderers led by the notorious criminal Lucretia van der Roycen. This woman is responsible for many atrocities, including the murder of her own father, the planetary governor of the Imperial world Seleucar. She conspired with void rabble, helped them commit a massacre on her home planet, became their leader, and now she is running amok. I invite you to join me in bringing her to justice!"
